lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson has apologized for sparking a verbal spat with former United States captain Hal Sutton at Hazeltine National over events that occurred during the 2004 Ryder Cup at Oakland Hills.

headline.print_headline: 'I Am So, So Sorry,' Mickelson Says in Sutton Apology
headline.main: 'I Am So, So Sorry,' Mickelson Says in Sutton Apology

snippet: Phil Mickelson has apologized for sparking a verbal spat with former United States captain Hal Sutton at Hazeltine National over events that occurred during the 2004 Ryder Cup at Oakland Hills....
